thread.title: 'How does Shona know Kylie Platt?' Coronation Street viewers confused as she visits murdered character's grave
thread.title_full: 'How does Shona know Kylie Platt?' Coronation Street viewers confused as she visits murdered character's grave

author: Hayley Minn
title: 'How does Shona know Kylie Platt?' Coronation Street viewers confused as she visits murdered character's grave
text:
'How does Shona know Kylie Platt?' Coronation Street viewers confused as she visits murdered character's grave Some ITV viewers think she's David Platt's wife's SISTER Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Shona visits Kylie's grave in Coronation Street Share this video Get soaps   
Coronation Street revealed there’s a mysterious link between Shona Ramsay and the late Kylie Platt in tonight’s episode. 
David Platt ’s wife was sensationally killed off the ITV soap last year, when she was stabbed to death. 
And Shona only came into Corrie back in December when she stole David Platt’s wallet in a nightclub. 
She later came to live on the Street when vicar Billy found her hiding in the vestry and took her in. Shona knows Kylie Platt (Photo: ITV) She went to visit her grave (Photo: ITV) 
But, in tonight’s episode, it became clear she knows Kylie somehow. 
She panicked when Kylie’s gobby mate Gemma insisted they’d met before, but later calmed down and said they had a mutual friend and had been at a house party together four years ago - although it didn’t seem like she was telling the whole truth. 
Later, she was stood fighting back tears at Kylie’s grave. 
How does she know Kylie? How does she know Kylie? (Photo: ITV) Kylie was murdered last year (Photo: ITV) 
Many viewers think she could be her sister, with one saying: “I have a feeling Shona is either Kylie's sister or close friend- knew each other from the dog & gun #Corrie.” 
Another added: “Shona is Kylie's sister. HAS TO BE! Mannerisms are similar and she freaks out whenever David or Gemma are around. #Corrie. Read More Is she Kylie's sister? (Photo: ITV) Who knows? (Photo: ITV) Maybe she's related to Callum? (Photo: ITV) 
However, many viewers think she could be related to Callum Logan - Kylie’s ex who she murdered in Corrie’s 2015 live episode. 
One said: “So Shona knows Kylie? Maybe Shona could be Callum's sister and that's how she knew Kylie or maybe she could've been Kylie's sister?? #Corrie.” 
Another shared: “Reckon Shona is Callum's sister #corrie @itvcorrie #keepguessing.” 
*Coronation Street continues on ITV1 on Monday at 7.30pm Like us on Facebook
